overview: From 2025-06-01 to 2025-07-01, ethereum-optimism/specs had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 4 active contributors.

topContributors.summary: krofax: This month, krofax focused on documentation improvements, opening a pull request to update the data glossary in `ethereum-optimism/docs#1651`. This work involved 22 commits and modified 23 files, with 232 additions and 158 deletions. Their activity shows a primary focus on documentation.
sebastianst: Contributed this month by participating in code review. They provided feedback on 2 pull requests, which included one approval and one comment.

yashvardhan-kukreja: Focused on identifying areas for improvement in the ethereum-optimism/optimism repository this month. They opened two issues, proposing the addition of flashblocks support in kurtosis (#16514) and suggesting enhancements to monitoring and alerting (#16388).

jvmi7: This month, jvmi7's efforts were directed towards defining new feature work within the Optimism ecosystem. They initiated the planning for a new feature by creating issue ethereum-optimism/ecosystem#868, which outlines the implementation of a claim contract deployment process for a mini app.
cshein45: This month, cshein45's contribution was focused on documentation process improvement, opening an issue in `ethereum-optimism/docs` to suggest adding PR titles (#1675).
